content: Jan 23 U.S. construction materials suppliers that have a sizeable exposure to European housing markets are expected to report slower revenue growth this year than their domestic peers due to cooling housing demand on the continent and a stronger dollar.
name: Masco Corporation
title: Europe-exposed U.S. construction suppliers to trail domestic peers
